subject: p13353878
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is unchanged appearance of a left upper lung perihilar 5-cm mass-like opacity. The extent of the opacity is unchanged as compared the previous image. The opacity could represent both pneumonia or malignancy. Repeat followup chest x-ray should document complete resolution. Otherwise, CT of the thorax is advised.
